{{Big Brother endgame | hmpage = | seriesname = Big Brother Brasil | series = Season 12 (2012) | previous = Big Brother Brasil 11 | next = | housemates = Housemates | hmpage = | image = <!-- Do NOT add non-free content here without complying with WP:NFCC #10c --> | imagebg = #000 | legendwinner = Winner | legendrunner = Runner Up | legendevic = Evicted }} '''''Big Brother Brasil 12''''' is the upcoming twelfth season of '''''Big Brother Brasil''''' which is schedule to premiere January 10, 2012 on the [[Rede Globo]] [[television network]].
The show is produced by Endemol Globo and presented by news reporter [[Pedro Bial]]. The season was officially confirmed since 2008 as part of a millionaire contract between international Endemol and Rede Globo, which guaranteed seasons until 2012. The upcoming seasons will be part of a new contract that will be signed in September 2011 and will ensure the renewal of show until 2016 or 2020.<ref>{{cite web|url =http://noticias.r7.com/blogs/daniel-castro/2011/03/29/globo-por-enquanto-so-tem-garantido-o-12%C2%BA-big-brother/|title =Globo, por enquanto, sÃ³ tem garantido o 12Âº Big Brother|language=Portuguese|accessdate=2011-03-29}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url = http://www.adnews.com.br/midia/113937.html|title =BBB 11 termina com mais dinheiro e menos audiÃªncia|language=Portuguese|accessdate=2011-03-29}}</ref>
The prize award will be R$1,500,000 with tax allowances.
==Housemates== In this edition, the media speculated about the former housemates back in the game, because of the twisting of the [[Big Brother 13 (U.S.)]]. The former housemates speculated are:
* Ana Carolina, [[Big Brother Brasil 9|BBB 9]] * Francine Piaia, [[Big Brother Brasil 9|BBB 9]] * RodrigÃ£o Gomes, [[Big Brother Brasil 11|BBB 11]] * Cristiano Naya, [[Big Brother Brasil 11|BBB 11]] * Talula Pascoli, [[Big Brother Brasil 11|BBB 11]] * Rodrigo Carvalho, [[Big Brother Brasil 11|BBB 11]] * Fani Pacheco, [[Big Brother Brasil 7|BBB 7]] * NatÃ¡lia Cassasola, [[Big Brother Brasil 8|BBB 8]] * Lia Khey, [[Big Brother Brasil 10|BBB 10]] * Angelica Marques, [[Big Brother Brasil 10|BBB 10]] and * Serginho, [[Big Brother Brasil 10|BBB 10]]
But Boninho, the series director denied it through [[Twitter]].

==Production== ===Cast===
Casting and production started April 2011. Regional applications were due by April 15, 2011 until June 30, 2011. Starting on May 15, 2011 regional auditions were held in 10 different cities all over Brazil, with the first being [[Porto Alegre]]. The process ended on October 13, 2011 in [[Rio de Janeiro]].<ref>{{cite web|url =http://noticias.r7.com/blogs/daniel-castro/2011/03/29/globo-visitara-11-cidades-para-a-selecao-de-bbb-12/|title =Globo visitarÃ¡ 11 cidades para escolher o elenco de BBB 12|language=Portuguese|accessdate=2011-03-29}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url =http://diversao.terra.com.br/tv/bbb11/noticias/0,,OI5036225-EI17223,00-Producao+diz+que+olheiros+do+BBB+vao+as+ruas+em+abril.html|title =ProduÃ§Ã£o diz que olheiros do 'BBB 12' vÃ£o Ã s ruas em abril|language=Portuguese|accessdate=2011-03-29}}</ref> National applications were due by August 14, 2011 until October 31, 2011.<ref>{{cite web|url =http://bbb.globo.com/platb/blog-da-producao-bbb-12/2011/04/15/inscricao-para-o-bbb12-tem-duas-etapas/|title =InscriÃ§Ã£o tem etapa regional e nacional|language=Portuguese|accessdate=2011-04-15}}</ref>
Semi-finalist interviews will be held in the third or fourth quarter of 2011 and the final casting interviews will take place in early December 2011.
===Regional Auditions===
Auditions will be held in the following cities:<ref>{{cite web|url = http://bbb.globo.com/platb/blog-da-producao-bbb-12/2011/04/15/calendario-seletivas-regionais/|title =CalendÃ¡rio das Seletivas Regionais|language=Portuguese|accessdate=2011-04-15}}</ref>
